item.title: Day 27
item.description:
January 27, 2025 - Exploring Digital Logic & New Perspectives ğŸ”¬ğŸ“š

Morning Start: An Unexpected Study Session â˜€ï¸

  • Math class was canceled, but I didn’t knowâ€”ended up waking up early.
  • While everyone else was asleep, I studied Digital Design until my next class.

Class Ratings ğŸ“

  • Digital Systems â€“ 8/10, as solid as ever.
  • Physics â€“ 5/10, barely passable.
  • Signals & Systems â€“ 4/10, not engaging at all.

First Digital Systems Lab âš¡ğŸ”¬

  • Worked on breadboards & NAND gates using the 7600LS IC.
  • Plotted voltage input vs. outputâ€”a simple yet fascinating experiment.
  • Key realization:
    • Nature operates entirely in analog, yet digital logic allows us to compute faster and more efficiently.
    • Someone once had the vision to go against nature’s preference and create digital computationâ€”this thought truly stuck with me.
    • Might adopt this “go against nature to innovate” philosophy in my own life someday.

Evening: Discovering Vindhya South Mess ğŸ½ï¸

  • First time visiting Vindhya South Mess for snacks.
  • Vibe check:
    • Less commercial, smaller space.
    • More homely & peaceful compared to other messes.
  • Liked the change of atmosphere, might visit again.

Wrapping Up the Day ğŸ’»

A day filled with learning, realizations, and new experiencesâ€”loving the journey! ğŸš€

item.title: Day 18
item.description:
January 18, 2025 - Robotics Challenges and Triumphs

Morning & Afternoon: Endless Debugging

Continued working with the Raspberry Pi 4 and TurtleBot:

  • Spent a tiring morning flashing, reflashing, corrupting, and recorrupting the memory card. It felt like an endless cycle, testing my patience at every step.
  • Ran into several frustrating issues with storage integrity, but kept pushing through.

Evening: Progress Made

All the effort paid off!

  • Successfully set up teleoperation (teleop) for the TurtleBot, allowing me to manually control its movement.
  • Achieved autodock functionality, enabling it to autonomously return to its charging dock.

The sense of accomplishment was immense, and all the hard work felt worth it in the end.

Today was truly a whirlwind of emotions and excitement, giving me strong hints that 2025, although an odd year, might just be a spectacular one. item.title: Day 12
item.description:
January 12, 2025 - Saarang Day 3: Mixed Vibes and Rocking Nights

Today was a whirlwind of emotions, experiences, and energy as I continued soaking in the vibes of Saarang Fest 2025. Here’s how it unfolded:

CTF Disappointment

The day started with high hopes as I participated in the IIT Kanpur Web3-based CTF, but it turned out to be a letdown. Honestly, it didnâ€™t even feel like a proper CTF. The focus was more on programming questions, and they didnâ€™t even provide the full test cases for the challenges, which made it frustrating to solve. After a couple of attempts, I lost interest and decided not to bother proceeding further.

item.title: Day 11
item.description:
January 11, 2025 - A Day of Cultural Thrills, Secret Adventures, and Football Frenzy

Today was an exciting rollercoaster of experiences, packed with cultural festivities, sporting spirit, and some intriguing classified adventures. Hereâ€™s how my day unfolded:

Fixing Gazebo Issues

I started the day resolving the persistent Gazebo simulation errors. After spending time troubleshooting, I discovered that the issue stemmed from mismatched file paths in the scripts and the actual directory. Thankfully, after making the necessary corrections, the simulation was finally up and running smoothly. Fixing this was a huge relief and a great start to the day.

item.title: Day 10
item.description:
January 10, 2025 - A Day Full of Learning, Action, and Inspiration

Today was a perfect blend of progress in technical skills and unforgettable experiences at the Saarang cultural fest. Hereâ€™s how my day unfolded:

LeetCode & CTF Progress

I started the day with some problem-solving on LeetCode, tackling a couple of interesting questions, including a binary tree search problem that used recursive iteration. It was a fantastic challenge that made me appreciate the elegance of recursion in binary tree algorithms.

item.title: Day 9
item.description:
January 9, 2025 - A Carnival of Culture and Creativity

Today marked Day 0 of Saarang, our much-awaited cultural fest, and it was a day brimming with excitement, camaraderie, and awe-inspiring experiences.

Exploring Stalls: A Vibrant Start

The day kicked off with a visit to the fest stalls alongside my friends.

  • There were countless food stalls, far more than we had during our tech fest. The aromas and diversity of flavors were captivating.
  • Other stalls showcased aesthetic items, rings, accessories, and exclusive merchandise that added to the festival charm.
  • Book lovers were not left out, with bookstalls lining the lanes, offering treasures for the avid reader.
  • I also noticed preparations for a carnival-like atmosphere, with towering structures like a Ferris wheel and huge swings being built. The festive energy was undeniable!

Drama and Theatrics: Performances That Inspire

Next, I headed to the CLT Lawns (Central Lecture Theatre) to witness a drama competition featuring performances from various colleges.

item.title: Day 8
item.description:
January 8, 2025 - A Day of Exploration in ROS2

Today was a self-paced and highly productive day as I took a deep dive into the world of Robot Operating System 2 (ROS2). Without any scheduled events or workshops, I focused on expanding my robotics knowledge and experimenting hands-on with new concepts.

Building ROS2 Nodes

My primary goal was to enhance my understanding of ROS2 by creating custom publisher and subscriber nodes. I used my laptop’s webcam to verify their functionality, and the experiment was a success! The subscriber node processed real-time data from the webcam, while the publisher efficiently relayed the output. This reinforced my understanding of ROS2’s core architecture and messaging mechanisms.

item.title: Day 7
item.description:
January 7, 2025 - A Day of Cybersecurity, Celebrations, and Comfort

Today was an exciting journey of learning and preparation, offering a perfect balance between intellectual challenges and personal organization. Ethical Hacking Workshop: Unveiling Cyber Secrets

The day began with a fascinating Ethical Hacking Workshop that featured two in-depth sessions:

Session 1 (9:00 AM - 12:00 PM): Focused on the basics of ethical hacking, emphasizing methodologies and tools used to identify and mitigate vulnerabilities.
Session 2 (2:00 PM - 5:00 PM): Took a deeper dive into advanced hacking techniques, offering hands-on exercises to strengthen our understanding of cyber defense mechanisms.

The workshop wasnâ€™t just about learning to break into systems but understanding how to protect them. It was both enlightening and empowering. Diving Into CTF Challenges

item.title: ETHICAL HACKING WORKSHOP
item.description:
THE CIA TRIAD: -THE VALUE BEHIND THE FIELD

  1. integrity
  2. confidentiality
  3. availability

THE DIFFERENCE BETWEEN IP ADDRESS AND MAC ADDRESS

IP Address: Logical, identifies devices across networks.
MAC Address: Physical, identifies devices within networks.

THE OSI (OPEN SYSTEM INTERCOMMUNICATION) MODEL:

  1. Physical Layer: Transfers raw bits over physical mediums.
  2. Data Link Layer: Manages node-to-node data transmission reliability.
  3. Network Layer: Routes data packets between networks.
  4. Transport Layer: Ensures error-free, complete data transfer.
  5. Session Layer: Manages and controls communication sessions.
  6. Presentation Layer: Formats, encrypts, and translates application data.
  7. Application Layer: Enables user and application interactions.

Here are common exploits at each layer of the OSI model:

item.title: Day 6
item.description:
January 6, 2025 - A Day of Insights, Entertainment, and Delights

Blockchain Workshop: Learning the Technology of Tomorrow

The day began with a highly informative Blockchain Workshop that spanned across two engaging sessions:

Session 1 (9:00 AM - 12:00 PM): Focused on the fundamentals of blockchain technology, its architecture, and applications.
Session 2 (2:00 PM - 5:00 PM): Built on the foundation laid earlier, diving into smart contracts and decentralized applications. The workshop provided a great mix of theory and hands-on experience, helping me gain a clearer perspective on blockchain's immense potential.

Spectacular Envisage Show at the SAC

item.title: BLOCKCHAIN DEVELOPMENT WORKSHOP
item.description:
Blockchain Workshop Notes

Introduction to Blockchain Concepts

  • Blockchain: A decentralized, distributed ledger technology for storing transaction records in immutable blocks.
  • Decentralization: Eliminating a central authority to improve security and transparency.
  • Distributed Ledger: A shared database replicated across nodes in a network.
  • Hashing: A cryptographic method to map data to fixed-size values securely.

SHA-256

Key characteristics of the SHA-256 hashing algorithm:

  1. Deterministic: Same input produces the same output every time.
  2. Collision Resistance: Difficult to find two inputs that produce the same hash.
  3. Fast: Quick computation ensures efficiency.
  4. One-Way: Impossible to reverse-engineer input from the hash.

A valid hash meets specific criteria, such as having a fixed number of leading zeros.

item.title: Day 5
item.description:
January 5, 2025 - A Day of Learning, Exploration, and Celebration

Focused Study on Vector Spaces

The day began with an intense 90-minute math session, during which I delved deeper into topics related to vector spaces.

  • Key Learnings: Linear dependence, linear combination, span of a vector subspace, and their core properties.
  • Resources Used: Referred to multiple books from our library and supplemented the reading with NPTEL lectures for added clarity. This session helped solidify my conceptual understanding of the subject.

Stall Exploration and Puzzle Challenges

Library Study Time: Vector Spaces and Subspaces

  • Set up my journal for the new year: Dedicated some time today to create a fresh journal layout for 2025. This will help keep my daily progress and thoughts organized for the upcoming semester.

item.title: New Year New Me
item.description:
A New Year, A New Vision

As the new year unfolds, I’m reflecting on the journey so far and looking ahead to the exciting challenges and opportunities to come.

Academics and Aspirations

  • My focus remains on excelling in electrical engineering at IITM, diving deeper into semiconductor specialization, and staying aligned with my goal of securing a top-tier placement at companies like NVIDIA, Intel, and Amazon.
  • Beyond academics, I aim to sharpen my competitive programming skills, mastering problem-solving to stand out in tech challenges.

Building and Innovating

  • Iâ€™ve made strides in personal projects, from developing apps like Florafix to diving into open-source and honing my web development skills with frameworks like Hugo.
  • CTF challenges and exploring cybersecurity continue to expand my skill set and fuel my curiosity for problem-solving.

Health, Habits, and Growth

  • Discipline in routines like morning study sessions and mindful eating remain key to balancing my ambitions with personal well-being.
  • Music, podcasts, and meaningful interactions are helping me stay relaxed and creative.

The Road Ahead

2025 is about building momentum toward becoming financially stable and striving for excellence in all my endeavors, whether it’s academics, projects, or personal growth. It’s another step closer to the big dream of making an impact and supporting my family.

item.title: The Power of Automation in Everyday Life
item.description:
Automation isn’t just a buzzword. Itâ€™s quietly revolutionizing the way we live, work, and interact with the world. From the moment you wake up to the time you hit the bed at night, automation is there, making everything smoother and more efficient. But what does this really mean for us as individuals?

What is Automation?

At its core, automation is the use of technology to perform tasks without human intervention. This can range from simple tasks, like setting alarms or automating your morning coffee, to more complex systems, such as self-driving cars or financial algorithms predicting stock market trends.

item.title: Exploring the Digital Frontier
item.description:
Welcome to the Digital Frontier

As we stand at the crossroads of the digital age, technology is rapidly transforming every aspect of our lives. From artificial intelligence to blockchain, the future promises a new world where digital innovations drive change at an unprecedented pace. In this post, weâ€™ll explore some of the most exciting developments in technology and how theyâ€™re shaping our world.

The Rise of Artificial Intelligence

Artificial Intelligence (AI) has emerged as one of the most powerful forces in modern technology. AI is no longer just a concept from science fiction â€” itâ€™s a reality thatâ€™s influencing industries like healthcare, finance, and entertainment. But what does the future hold for AI?

item.title: Exploring the Power of Open-Source Software
item.description:
Open-source software has become a powerful force in the technology world, shaping everything from operating systems to development tools. In this post, weâ€™ll explore what open-source software is, why it matters, and how it has revolutionized the way we build and use technology.

What is Open-Source Software?

Open-source software refers to software whose source code is made available to the public to view, use, modify, and distribute. This collaborative model of software development promotes transparency, community involvement, and innovation. Famous examples of open-source software include:

item.title: ğŸ““ The Obsidian Chronicles - Why Markdown Rules My World
item.description:
Markdown is the silent warrior of the digital age. It doesnâ€™t dazzle with fancy fonts or over-the-top styling. Instead, it whispers: “Hereâ€™s your content, pure and simple.” And when paired with Obsidian, that simplicity transforms into something… magical.

Why Markdown?

Markdown is my go-to tool for note-taking, blogging, and organizing my digital life. Hereâ€™s why:

  • No Vendor Lock-in: Your notes remain accessible forever. No pesky proprietary formats.
  • Speed: Plain text is blazingly fastâ€”even on my ancient laptop.
  • Portability: Open it anywhereâ€”your phone, your desktop, or even a Raspberry Pi.

Obsidian: My Brainâ€™s Second Home ğŸ§ 

Obsidian isnâ€™t just a note-taking app; itâ€™s a knowledge powerhouse. Its bi-directional links and graph view turn my random thoughts into structured networks of ideas.
